name: Spooky Shooter (mfrank23)
description:
Spooky Shooter! Automatically shoot the ghosts, bats, and spiders as you run away from them!

How to play: WASD keys to move, Tab key to pause. Unlock Random Gun at 500 cash and Auto Gun at 3000 cash. Win at 10000 cash! You'll die when you are out of health, don't die! Some enemies will be faster and harder to kill than others, but they will drop higher power pickups!

Power-ups: Brown Gem - 1 cash   Yellow Gem - 10 cash   Blue Gem - 100 cash   Purple Gem - 1000 Cash   Heart - 25 health    Mushroom - +5 speed (one-time use)
